Pre-Game Insights: India is preparing to counter Afghanistan's strong bowling department in their crucial T20 World Cup Super 8 match.
Indian batters have played against Afghanistan players frequently in the IPL, giving them an edge in understanding their strategies.
Rohit Sharma emphasized that the team is focused on their skill sessions and adapting to the challenging schedule.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rinku Singh, a reserve player, is waiting for his chance to play in the World Cup.
The team is staying in Barbados and is engaging in beach volleyball for relaxation.
